data.body:
for knots backed beats, when the user clicks "Take!", we want to prompt with "poll!" as described in foolery-eaa9 - except now we want to execute that same command in a loop until:

- the shipped state has been achieved OR
- a human owned state has been reached OR
- 10 polls have been executed without the checkpoints above having been achieved.
data.title: Take!:  convert to poll loop for knots backed beats
